turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick up the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i find that drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like to order your coffee in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering a tall blonde roast, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me find the store closest to you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is the store on 5th street the closest starbucks to you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place your order, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall blonde roast to be picked up at the starbucks on 5th street, is that correct?
